titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, June 4, 1946

mods.note: "National Congress of American Indians" WBBF, Ponca City, Oklahoma (Remote)
mods.tableOfContents: Introduction - Mr. Welch, Judge. Jesse Rowlodge. Jimmie Belvin. Unknown Speaker -. Harry (?). Rev. White Parker. N.B. Johnson, Judge. Talks were on Indian Treaty Rights, Legislative Matters, Indian Schools in Oklahoma, Western Oklahoma Indian Problems, Education, also Religious Adjustment and Adaptation to Civilization.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
